'''Radiant Spincrystal 90''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]].<!--to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].-->

It is located on a platform, next to a jackal statue, inside the ruin that is located at [[Safhe Shatranj]].
